name: Craft World 3D: Block Games!
description:
Craft World 3D is a new construction simulator and survival game. Mine blocks, craft items and other resources, build houses and cities. Hunt, fish, raise livestock, decorate your homes and have fun!

Game features:
- Lots of items to build and decorate houses.
- Sophisticated survival mode for complete immersion.
- Lots of animals and interesting enemy mobs.
- Several types of infinite map generation
- Changing character skins and own store
- Beautiful textures, nice 3D models and much more!

If you have any questions about the game or find bugs, please let us know in the review or at: support@knuckle.games

Also follow us on our page:
https://www.facebook.com/knucklegames
